$comment: This schema is used to validate dragon armor JSON files in the data/dmr/armor directory. Each armor type defines a set of protection values and loot tables for dragon armor.
title: Dragon Armor Schema
description: Schema for defining dragon armor types with their protection values and loot tables

protection.description: Protection level provided by this armor type. Higher values provide more damage reduction when the dragon is attacked.

loot_tables.description: Collection of loot tables that can contain this armor type, along with their drop chances and quantities.
